name: Subject 11: The Broken Timer
description:
This game is about a test in line to try out MonoDevelop's latest prototype for the Error Preventer, a device which allows the user to rewind back 5 seconds in time to prevent any small mistakes fro becoming costly in the long term. Wallrun, bounce, run and rewind to complete the levels and prove its capabilities.

Extra controls:

Left shift - Toggle cursor on / off
Shift + A / Shift + D - Wallrun(don't hold for faster speeds)

R - hold to rewind
